page.title: 18Children's Adventure Week
page.content: In Children's Adventure Week we have lots of fun. It costs Â£2.50 for five days. It sounds expensive but it is in fact worth every penny. Throghout the week you go out on Day Trips, for example last we were all taken to St. Nicholas' Park, that was fun. There is a swimming pool there. We also went to the Cotswold Wild Life Park last year. That was a great trip out too. We play games throughout the week like uni-hock. This is like hockey with only six to a side. My leader last year was Steven, he lives up my road and I know him well. ({P.Stokes}) This takes place during the summer vacation to give children aged 8-12 something to do. It is staffed and organised by adult volunteers.
